meanings.definition: Relating to a type of reproduction in plants where the embryo develops from a cell other than the egg cell.
meanings.sent1: The aposporic process in plants is fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The aposporic method of reproduction is essential for plant diversity.
meanings.sent3: The aposporic plants decided to have a party without the egg cell.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed aposporically, like an embryo growing independently.
meanings.sent5: The aposporic nature of plant reproduction is like a secret garden waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Showing apospory, or the development of an embryo from a cell other than the egg cell.
meanings.sent1: The aposporic characteristics of the plant were evident in its unique growth pattern.
meanings.sent2: Her aposporic traits made her stand out among her peers.
meanings.sent3: The aposporic plant was the life of the garden party.
meanings.sent4: His ideas sprouted aposporically, branching out in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The aposporic features of the organism were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
